item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 9, 2025 at 8:25 AM UTC
item.description:

11. Zombieverter: Open source VCU for reusing salvage EV components (8 points | discuss)
12. A flat pricing subscription for Claude Code (153 points | 131 comments)
13. Audiobookshelf: Self-hosted audiobook and podcast server (50 points | 21 comments)

25. Phoenician culture spread mainly through cultural exchange (68 points | 21 comments)
26. Prepare your apps for Google Play's 16 KB page size compatibility requirement (64 points | 38 comments)
27. How to start a school with your friends (121 points | 43 comments)
28. For better or for worse, the overload (2024) (10 points | discuss)
29. Stability by Design (105 points | 35 comments)
30. First American pope elected and will be known as Pope Leo XIV (551 points | 850 comments)
